text.text_translated: One night in 2003, Suzanne Collins was watching television. The news programmes were about the war between the USA and Iraq. Other programmes were games where young people tried to win a million dollars. Suzanne says that her brain put the two types of programmes together in a bad way and her story 'The Hunger Games' came from that.
